#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int extractingdigit(int number);

int main(){
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		int c = extractingdigit(a);
		int d = extractingdigit(b);
		int sum = c + d;
		while(sum%10==0){
			sum = sum/10;
		}
		int revsum = extractingdigit(sum);
		cout<< revsum <<endl;
	}
	
}

int extractingdigit(int number){
	
	int test=number;
	int temp=number;
	int p,d=0,sum=0;
	while((temp)!=0){
		p=temp%10;
		temp=temp/10;
		++d;
	}
    int array[d];
    int counter;
	for(counter=0;counter<d;counter++){
		array[counter]=(number% 10);
		number=number/10;
	}
	for(counter=0;counter<d;counter++){
		sum = sum + array[counter]*(pow(10,d-counter-1));
	}
	return sum; 
/*	int r=0;
	while(number > 0){
		r= r*10 + number%10;
		number = number/10;
	}
	return r; */
}
